name: Zerachan Puzzle Pitatto Pair
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

This game can be enjoyed with PlayStation®3.

This is a puzzle game that will challenge you to gather and connect!
Erase pieces on the screen with the least amount of steps possible!
Enjoy different routs and the 3 different modes with a scoring system!
